item.description:
Here's an opportunity to get further information and training on barefoot running from one of the earliest proponents of barefoot running. Ken Bob Saxton will be giving a free workshop from 9 am to 11:30 am on Sunday, June 9th, at The Maine Running Company.

Here's all the info you want to know about Barefoot Ken Bob from his website: RunningBarefoot.org

 

Focus of Workshop:

Focus in Barefoot Ken Bob’s Running Barefoot Workshops is typically on walking/running technique, not on senselessly pounding out miles. Distance comes AFTER mastering gentle technique (no pounding). There is, after all, no sense in practicing bad or injurious technique. Folks can stick around afterward for a run (with or without shoes) with Barefoot Ken Bob, Cathy, and maybe Herman too.

Here's a great starting point if you want to read Ken Bob's thoughts on How to Run Barefoot
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group of crazy barefooters!
item.name: Barefoot Ken Bob's Nor'Easter Barefoot Tour - Portland, Maine
